location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Morier, encamped at Aberan, on the frontiers of Georgia and Persia, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from James Morier, encamped at Aberan, on the frontiers of Georgia and Persia, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, transmitting an account balance of William Bruce's account, dated 17 June 1814 at Aberan, by Sir Gore Ouseley, former Ambassador to Persia.
